page.title: 20HEALTH Pentney & Narboro'
page.content:
The residents of both villages are served by General Practioners from Swaffham some seven miles distant, although one of these holds a surgery at Narborough. The nearest chemist's shop is also in Swaffham. Sometimes these facts present residents with difficulties concerning transport. However with co-operation from friends and neighbours these are usually overcome. The main General Hospital is situated in King's Lynn with a Cottage Hospital at Swaffham.
------------
The information recorded here was collected, collated and edited by members of the Pentney and West Bilney Women's Institute, together with members of their families.
